title: The Insane Rise of Dogecoin | Guests: Scott Walker & Brian Lilley | 4/19/21
description:
Planned Parenthood finally acknowledged the racism of its founder, Margaret Sanger. But will its officials acknowledge their current racist policies? Pat Gray stops by to discuss CNN’s Chris Cuomo’s insane point about police, Rep. Maxine Waters’ recent incitement of protests, and Madonna’s call to end due process for police officers. Glenn goes over how badly banks are messing with our economy and how it will affect the common American. Glenn and Stu discuss Dogecoin’s rise and how a Marxist BLM co-founder can afford so many houses. Young America’s Foundation President Scott Walker joins to talk labor unions and YAF’s long-term goals. The Toronto Sun’s Brian Lilley shares how bad government overreach has gotten in Canada due to COVID.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
